name: The Pervaders
description:
Quick note:

There may be audio crackling in the embedded HTML5 version of the game. If you are experiencing audio crackling, please download the Windows version below. Sorry for the inconvenience.

The Pervaders


The sacred charm that protects the village of Plukk has faltered and the evil Pervaders have made their move.

A child has become their victim and must now suffer an endless nightmare at their hands.

His only hope of escape is to pass a series of trials that divulge his greatest fears.

He must prove his courage to the Pervaders...

...or remain sleeping forever.




How To Play WASD / Arrow Keys Move Enter Pause / Skip Text






The Pervaders was made in 3 days for Mini Jam #77. Thank you to everyone who played.
